deprecated_yaml.title: The Google Translate Text-to-Speech configuration is being removed
deprecated_yaml.description:
Your Google Translate Text-to-Speech configuration was already imported into the UI. 

Remove the Google Translate Text-to-Speech YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.

migration.title: The Google Translate Text-to-Speech configuration is being removed

confirm.title: Migrate your Google Translate Text-to-Speech configuration
confirm.description:
The Google Translate Text-to-Speech configuration is being removed. 

Your Google Translate Text-to-Speech configuration can be imported automatically to the UI by clicking submit below. Remove the `google_translate` platform configuration under the `tts` section from your `configuration.yaml` after the import is done.

If you have automations or scripts that use the `tts.google_translate_say` service you will need to update these to use the `tts.speak` service instead.

Do not forget to clean up the your `configuration.yaml` after migration.

Submit to import your Google Translate Text-to-Speech configuration to the UI.

abort.already_configured: The Google Translate Text-to-Speech config was already imported to the UI. Remove the `google_translate` platform configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
